text:
Use the context below to fill the JSON fields. Follow these section rules:

- Summary: One paragraph; do not start with "SDE Summary".
- Architecture: Name framework and entrypoint from repo_summary (primary_framework, entrypoint_files, entry_points). If absent, say what you looked for.
- API / Endpoints: Use repo_summary.api_routes when present; include method, path, file_path. If api_routes is empty, write one sentence like "No routes in repo_summary.api_routes; context had api_chunk_hits=N and entrypoint_files: [...]".
- Data models: From repo_summary.model_hints; give each a one-line purpose (e.g. User â€“ authentication). Do not list names only.
- Code structure: Describe layout (e.g. src/services, src/api) and cite repo_summary (config_files, repository_type).
- Setup & Run: If repo_summary has entrypoint_files or config, cite them; otherwise say what you looked for.
- Security: If Token/login/signup appear in model_hints or context, note auth hints; otherwise say what you checked.
- sources (optional): Add file paths you used per section, e.g. {{"architecture": ["src/main.py"], "api": ["src/api/v1/analysis.py"]}}.

Context (JSON):
{context_json}
